messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Liza Thornberry(more thoughts)
messages.msgSnippet: We too love this show and Debbie is my personal favorite. The only problem I have with the show is that Liza is often dishonest with her parents. They will
messages.messageBody:
We too love this show and Debbie is my personal favorite. The only problem I
have with the show is that Liza is often dishonest with her parents. They
will tell her to stay in camp, for her own safety, and she says she will but
leaves the minute after her parents leave. Her word is like worthless. Of
course there is always a good reason, she will be trying to save an animal or
something, and usually about gets herself killed. Or she tells her Mom, while
camping, that she is going to bed and instead sneaks off. We still watch the
show and we like it but we do discuss why it would be a bad idea to behave
this way and we all agree here that is a failing in the show.
peace and grace
Candy
